modules.description: Sets up a metrics reporter that generates output in Gnuplot-compatible formats, allowing specification of the output directory and type (`Image`, `Script`, or `Datafile`). It works with internal metric data structures to produce visualizations or raw data files. Use this to generate plots or data files for performance analysis directly from collected metrics.

Monitors garbage collection statistics with configurable intervals and depth. It supports enabling or disabling GC stat collection and uses either quick or full GC stats. Useful for profiling memory usage in long-running applications or services.
